text: he eemaan vaalo! jab tum allaah kee raah mein (jihaad ke lie) nikalo, to bhalee-bhaanti parakh[1] lo aur koee tumhen salaam[2] kare, to ye na kaho ki tum eemaan vaale nahin ho. kya tum saansaarik jeevan ka upakaran chaahate ho? jabaki allaah ke paas bahut-se parihaar (shatrudhan) hain. tumabhee pahale aise[3] hee the, to allaah ne tumapar upakaar kiya. atah, bhalee-bhaanti parakh liya karo. nihsandeh, allaah usase soochit hai, jo tum kar rahe ho
